sentence.Network_en: He is the most sagacious member of the committee.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是委员会里最富洞察力的成员.

sentence.Network_en: He thought me much more sagacious than I was.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把我看得太高明了,而我实际上并不是这样.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... vivacious 活泼的，有生气的 sagacious 聪明的 capacious 容量大的.
明字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 明知故问〖 askwhileknowingtheanswer〗 明智〖 sagacious;sensible;wise〗 明珠〖 pearl〗.
英语词根词缀记忆法_百度文库 ... (rape 掠夺,强奸) sagacious a 睿智的 (sage 智者).
词根及词缀 ... sage n 贤人，哲人 sagacious a 精明的，智慧的 presage n 预感，预兆.

list.abs: He is the most sagacious member of the committee ., 他是委员会里最富洞察力的成员.
He is a sagacious person ., 他是个精明的人.
People love dogs because they are sagacious animals ., 人们爱狗 , 因为它们是有灵性的动物.
the leader made a sagacious decision ., 领导做了英明的决定.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin sagax, sagac- 'wise' + -ious

entry.tran: 聪慧的;精明的;有决策力的
entry.def: A sagacious person is intelligent and has the ability to make good decisions.

sentences.sentence: "much too perspicacious to be taken in by such a spurious argument"
"observant and thoughtful, he was given to asking sagacious questions"
"a source of valuable insights and sapient advice to educators"

auth_sentence.content: Those studies which form strenuous and sagacious men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Those studies which form strenuous and sagacious men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Those studies which form strenuous and sagacious men.

auth_sentence.content: Some sagacious onlookers believe she will be better than Ennis one day.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some sagacious onlookers believe she will be better than Ennis one day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some sagacious onlookers believe she will be better than Ennis one day.

auth_sentence.content: Simcock possibly needs the right producer, an experienced, sagacious elder who can coach him to good effect.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Simcock possibly needs the right producer, an experienced, sagacious elder who can coach him to good effect.

means.word_mean: 精明的, 有判断力的
